basic.blooming: Flowering period April, fruiting period April-July
basic.color: Flower color yellow brown, fruit color brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, grows in sunny places, avoid direct strong light at seedling stage
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
